name: Carbon for Reddit - RES & Chat Fixes
description: This aims to fix various aspects of the popular theme Carbon for Reddit (https://userstyles.org/styles/161093/carbon-for-reddit)
additional_info:
Carbon for Reddit is a great theme however it lacks support for various RES classes as well as completely removing the new Reddit chat and leaving it unthemed once put back. This theme aims to fix these shortcomings.

v 1.1 - September 19th
-------------------------------------
- Added back the original (official) chat icon since the one from Carbon for Reddit seemingly broke
